name: Wall-E & Eve
description:
For this prototype we have:

  • Changed the entire layout of what we already had in the Coco Spaceonaut game in order to represent our idea.
  • Created a new art for the game design, we created new art for the player and for the enemies and we implemented 3 levels, in the last level, which was the victory level, the robot Wall-e finds Eva.
  • We will implement the next phase from this last level, where we will create a scenario similar to the interior of the Axion ship and we will make improvements to the levels that we have already implemented.
